price: (Addunyaatti) agartuun (ijji) Isa hin agartu, Inni immoo agartuu hunda ni arga, Inni mararfataa, beekaadha. {1}
arabic: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
footnotes: {1} adduniyatti Rabbiin arguun hindandayamu. aakhiratti ammoo mu'imintoonni isa ni argu, kuni qur'aanaafii hadiisaanis mirkanaayee jira.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
